properties.title: SRA-U Developing RESTful Web Services with Java
properties.author: jcstaff@apl.jhu.edu

section.name: Developing RESTful Web Services with Java
section.p:
This is the course document page for the Developing RESTful Web Services with Java being conducted Spring 2012. The main course coordination portal page is located at
https://teams.portal.sra.com/support/sra-u/S2012/restful.

Legal Disclaimer: The information and opinions expressed within the materials located on this site are the personal contributions of Jim Stafford. Content published here is not reviewed or approved by my employers (The Johns Hopkins University and SRA International) before it is posted and does not necessarily represent the views and opinions of my employers.

ul.li: 2012-04-22: Posted draft materials to build server
